about_the_game:
A new career for Sienna Fuegonasus


Necromancers raise the dead to fulfill their every command. Drawn to the Dark Magic following a battle with her twin sister Sofia, Sienna now strides into battle at the head of a company of skeletons, wielding a Soulstealer Staff and Ensorcelled Reaper to bestow the gift of death upon her foes.



  • Cut through your enemies with the Ensorcelled Reaper and drain their living essence with the Soulstealer Staff
  • Call upon Dark Magic to raise a regiment of skeletons to fight at your side
  • Master the Necromantic arts with a new career ability and talent tree
  • Embrace the path of unlife with exclusive character skins and new voice lines



NOTE: When purchasing Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Necromancer Career you will receive 100 Shillings (in-game currency) to spend in the in-game store.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

Necromancers raise the dead to fulfill their every command. Drawn to the Dark Magic following a battle with her twin sister Sofia, Sienna now strides into battle at the head of a company of skeletons, wielding a Soulstealer Staff and Ensorcelled Reaper to bestow the gift of death upon her foes.

  • Call upon Dark Magic to raise a regiment of skeletons to fight at your side
  • Master the Necromantic arts with a new career ability and talent tree
  • Embrace the path of unlife with exclusive character skins and new voice lines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Necromancer is a new career for Sienna Fuegonasus. It contains the new playable career complete with a new talent tree, new weapon types, new abilities, a whole new Necromancer skin, and more.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
